hangover.title: IV Hangover Relief
hangover.description: Revive and recover quickly from alcohol consumption. This therapy detoxifies your body, eliminates toxins, and rehydrates effectively, providing rapid relief from hangover symptoms.
ingredients: B-Complex Vitamins (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6)
benefits: Immediate relief from nausea and vomiting
Significant reduction of headache and body aches
Restoration of energy levels within 30 minutes

dehydration.title: IV Dehydration Recovery
dehydration.description: Feel refreshed and revitalized with rapid fluid replacement. Replenish electrolytes, boost energy, and improve your mood with this essential hydration therapy.
benefits: Immediate restoration of fluid volume (within 15 minutes)
Improved cognitive function and mental clarity
Increased energy levels and physical alertness
Better mood regulation and emotional stability

foodPoisoning.title: IV Food Poisoning & Stomach Flu Recovery
foodPoisoning.description: Accelerate recovery from gastrointestinal distress. This therapy helps heal your stomach lining and is ideal for treating food poisoning and all gastrointestinal symptoms.
benefits: Rapid relief from nausea and vomiting (within 20 minutes)
Stomach lining protection and accelerated healing
Complete restoration of lost fluids and nutrients
Improved digestive function and gut health
Enhanced immune response to fight infection

myers.title: IV Myers Cocktail
myers.description: The gold standard of IV therapy. This classic formula boosts red blood cell production, accelerates muscle recovery, improves sleep quality, and strengthens your immune system.
benefits: Improved energy metabolism and ATP production
Better sleep quality and REM cycle regulation
Reduced muscle fatigue and faster recovery
Increased red blood cell production and oxygen delivery
Support for chronic fatigue syndrome symptoms

energy.title: IV Energy Boost
energy.description: Combat fatigue and low energy with a scientifically formulated blend of IV fluids, electrolytes, vitamins, and antioxidants designed to revitalize your body at the cellular level.
benefits: Significant increase in energy levels (up to 8 hours)
Enhanced mental clarity and cognitive focus

muscle.title: IV Muscle Recovery
muscle.description: Optimize athletic performance and recovery. This therapy enhances muscle regeneration, reduces inflammation, and includes amino acids and nutrients essential for peak physical condition.
benefits: Enhanced protein synthesis and muscle building
Improved athletic performance and power output

antiviral.title: IV Antiviral Defense
antiviral.description: Strengthen your body's natural defense against viral infections. This powerful formula uses high-dose vitamin C and zinc to target pathogens and enhance immune response.

benefits: Enhanced collagen synthesis for skin and joints
Enhanced wound healing and tissue repair

detox.title: IV Full Body Detox
detox.description: Comprehensive cellular detoxification to eliminate harmful toxins. This therapy enhances liver function, boosts your immune system, and restores your body's natural balance.
benefits: Enhanced liver detoxification (Phase I & II pathways)
Elimination of free radicals and toxins
Better skin health and radiant appearance

heavyMetal.title: IV Heavy Metal Cleanse
heavyMetal.description: Specialized chelation therapy to remove heavy metals and environmental toxins. This treatment improves circulation, reduces inflammation, and supports overall health.
benefits: Removal of lead, mercury, cadmium, and arsenic

glutathione.title: IV Glutathione Glow
glutathione.description: Master antioxidant therapy for cellular detoxification and radiant skin. This treatment boosts immunity, reduces oxidative stress, and enhances your natural glow from within.

antiInflammatory.description: Advanced inflammation reduction therapy combining curcumin, glutathione, and targeted nutrients to combat oxidative stress and support tissue repair for chronic and acute conditions.

jetLag.description: Restore your natural circadian rhythm quickly and effectively. This specialized therapy contains melatonin, vitamins, and relaxants to help reset your sleep cycle after travel.

iron.description: Combat iron deficiency anemia and chronic fatigue. This therapy safely increases iron levels, boosts red blood cell production, and enhances oxygen delivery throughout your body.

rejuvenation.title: All-Inclusive Rejuvenation IV

rejuvenationExtra.title: All-Inclusive Rejuvenation IV (Extra Strength)

group.title: Group & Event Pricing
group.subtitle: Special pricing available for groups and events. Perfect for corporate wellness, bachelor/bachelorette parties, or wellness retreats.
group.corporateDescription: We offer customized packages for corporate wellness events, conferences, retreats, and private parties. Our team will work with you to create the perfect IV therapy experience for your group.

travel.question: Is there an additional travel fee?
travel.answer: No, our prices include mobile service within our standard service area. For locations outside our service area, a small travel fee may apply.

insurance.question: Do you accept insurance?
insurance.answer: Currently, we do not accept insurance. However, you may be able to use your HSA or FSA for payment. We provide detailed receipts for your records.

payment.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, cash, HSA/FSA cards, and mobile payment options like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel your appointment up to 24 hours before your scheduled time without any fees. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a cancellation fee.

about.title: About IVIQ
about.subtitle: We're dedicated to revolutionizing healthcare by bringing premium IV therapy services directly to you, wherever you are.

story.title: Our Story
content: IVIQ was founded in 2023 with a simple yet powerful vision: to make high-quality IV therapy accessible, convenient, and personalized for everyone. Our founder, Dr. Sarah Johnson, recognized the growing need for preventative healthcare solutions that fit into busy modern lifestyles.

After years of working in emergency medicine, Dr. Johnson saw firsthand how IV therapy could dramatically improve patient outcomes. She realized that many people could benefit from IV therapy not just in emergency situations, but as part of their regular wellness routine.

Today, IVIQ serves hundreds of clients across the metro area, providing everything from hydration therapy to immune support, energy enhancement, and recovery treatments. We're proud to be at the forefront of the mobile healthcare revolution.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To empower individuals to optimize their health and wellness through convenient, professional, and personalized IV therapy services delivered with compassion and excellence.

values.title: Safety First
values.description: We maintain the highest safety standards with licensed professionals and medical-grade equipment.

values.title: Patient-Centered Care
values.description: Every treatment is personalized to meet your unique health needs and wellness goals.

values.title: Convenience
values.description: We bring professional IV therapy to your location, saving you time and ensuring comfort.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We're committed to providing the highest quality IV therapy services with exceptional results.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our team of licensed healthcare professionals is dedicated to providing you with safe, effective, and personalized IV therapy treatments.

members.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
members.title: Medical Director & Founder
members.bio: Dr. Johnson brings over 15 years of emergency medicine experience to IVIQ. She founded the company with a vision to make high-quality IV therapy accessible and convenient for everyone. Her expertise in critical care and patient safety ensures the highest standards of treatment.

members.name: Michael Chen
members.title: Registered Nurse
members.bio: Michael specializes in critical care nursing and has extensive experience in IV therapy administration. He ensures every patient receives the highest standard of care with his gentle approach and attention to detail. His 8+ years in healthcare make him a trusted member of our team.

members.name: Lisa Rodriguez
members.title: Nurse Practitioner
members.bio: Lisa focuses on preventative care and wellness optimization. She works closely with clients to develop personalized treatment plans that support their health goals. Her holistic approach to healthcare and 10+ years of experience help clients achieve optimal wellness.

certifications.title: Certifications & Compliance
certifications.description: IVIQ maintains the highest standards of medical care and regulatory compliance. We are committed to providing safe, effective treatments while protecting your privacy and health information.

benefitsPage.title: Benefits of IV Therapy
benefitsPage.subtitle: Discover why IV therapy is becoming the preferred method for delivering vitamins, minerals, and medications directly to your body.

keyBenefits.title: Key Benefits of IV Therapy
keyBenefits.subtitle: IV therapy offers numerous advantages over traditional oral supplements and medications.

items.title: 100% Absorption
items.description: IV therapy delivers nutrients directly into your bloodstream, ensuring 100% absorption compared to oral supplements which typically have only 20-50% absorption rates due to the digestive process.

items.title: Immediate Effects
items.description: Feel the benefits immediately as nutrients are delivered directly to your cells where they're needed most, rather than waiting hours or days for oral supplements to take effect.

items.title: Customized Treatment
items.description: Each IV formula can be tailored to address your specific health concerns and wellness goals, providing a personalized approach to your health and wellness.

items.title: Preventative Health
items.description: Regular IV therapy can help maintain optimal health and prevent deficiencies before they cause problems, supporting your body's natural defense systems.

items.title: Convenience
items.description: Our mobile service brings the benefits of IV therapy directly to your home, hotel, or office, saving you time and ensuring you can relax in a comfortable environment during treatment.

items.title: Professional Administration
items.description: All treatments are administered by licensed healthcare professionals who monitor your comfort and safety throughout the process.

howItWorks.title: How IV Therapy Works
description: IV therapy works by delivering nutrients directly into your bloodstream, bypassing the digestive system which can reduce the absorption of vitamins and minerals.
When nutrients are delivered intravenously, your body can absorb 100% of what it needs, compared to as little as 20% absorption from oral supplements.

This direct delivery method allows for higher doses of nutrients to be administered safely and effectively, providing immediate benefits and therapeutic effects that oral supplements simply cannot match.

steps.title: Direct Delivery
steps.description: Nutrients enter your bloodstream directly, bypassing the digestive system.

steps.title: Complete Absorption
steps.description: Your body absorbs 100% of the vitamins and minerals administered.

steps.title: Immediate Effect
steps.description: Benefits are felt quickly as nutrients are immediately available to your cells.

conditions.title: Conditions That Benefit From IV Therapy
conditions.subtitle: IV therapy can help with a wide range of health concerns and wellness goals.

items.title: Dehydration
benefits: Relief from symptoms like headache and fatigue
